description: Math-critical dependency graph for GR/warp pipelines.

edges.reason: GR loop uses gate evaluation for acceptance.
edges.waiver: Certified -> certified dependency for gate orchestration.

edges.reason: GR loop builds diagnostics from evolve bricks.
Evolve brick runs BSSN evolution with SI->geometric time conversion.
GR loop runs BSSN evolution.
Solver builds stress-energy fields from pipeline matter (stress scale SI<->geometric).
Stress-energy fields are built from the brick mapping (SI inputs scaled to geometric).
Brick mapping uses dynamic stress-energy equations (nm->m, ms->s conversions).
Brick mapping reads pipeline state defaults (gap_nm->gap_m conversion).
GR loop reads pipeline state and applies proposals.
Pipeline runs dynamic Casimir sweeps (GHz->Hz, us/ms->s conversions).
Pipeline computes Natario metric proxies (gap_nm->m, GHz->Hz conversions).
Pipeline uses stress-energy equation helpers (gap_nm->m, ms->s conversions).
Dynamic Casimir helpers use stress-energy equations.
GR evaluation derives gate status from diagnostics.
edges.waiver: Certified -> certified dependency for gate evaluation.

edges.reason: GR evaluation requires certificate integrity checks.
edges.waiver: Certified -> certified dependency for certificate issuance.

edges.reason: Gate evaluation can compute constraints from BSSN fields.
Diagnostics depend on constraint fields.
Certificate is based on viability evaluation.
Viability evaluation runs the energy pipeline.
Viability evaluation loads warp guardrail constraints.
Warp viability route issues certificates.
edges.waiver: Certified -> certified dependency for viability route.

edges.reason: Warp viability tool issues certificates.
edges.waiver: Certified -> certified dependency for viability tool.
